maintainPage.title: throughAsnDetailList

selectText.title: owner
selectText.hql: SELECT owner.id, owner.code, owner.name FROM Owner owner WHERE owner.disabled = '0' and owner.plant.wh = #{SESSION_WAREHOUSE}

list.title: title.status
list.hql: select en.enumValue, en.enumValue from Enumerate en where en.enumType='EnuAsnDetailStatus' and en.enumValue in ( '200','300','400' )

list.title: tempDiv
list.hql: SELECT e.enumValue, e.enumValue From Enumerate e where e.enumType = 'EnuTemperatureDiv'

maintainPage.datasource: select asnDetail.id, asnDetail.asn.owner.name, asnDetail.asn.asnNumber, asnDetail.asn.relatedBill1, asnDetail.status, asnDetail.lineNo, asnDetail.sku.code, asnDetail.sku.name, asnDetail.sku.specs, asnDetail.planPackage.name, asnDetail.planQty, asnDetail.executeQty, asnDetail.sku.tempDiv, asnDetail.sku.fixDiv from AsnDetail asnDetail where 1=1 and asnDetail.asn.wh = #{SESSION_WAREHOUSE} and asnDetail.status in (200,300,400) and asnDetail.stockDiv <> 1 /~owner: and asnDetail.asn.owner.id = {owner}~/ /~asnNumber: and asnDetail.asn.asnNumber like {asnNumber}~/ /~custBillNo: and asnDetail.asn.relatedBill1 like {custBillNo}~/ /~status: and asnDetail.status = {status}~/ /~sku.code: and asnDetail.sku.code like {sku.code}~/ /~sku.name: and asnDetail.sku.name like {sku.name}~/ /~tempDiv: and asnDetail.sku.tempDiv = {tempDiv}~/
